actorFilter.name: Actor Filter Type
actorFilter.hint: the filter type to select an actor for a gamepad

gamepadConfigApp.title: GamepadConfig
gamepadConfigApp.info: Press a button on a gamepad to connect it
gamepadConfigApp.userHint: Each gamepad needs to be assigned to an user.

uiConfigApp.title: User Configuration
uiConfigApp.info: This UserConfiguration is not global and only valid for the currently connected client
uiConfigApp.userPositionHint: When the monitor is lying on the table the position of the player towards the monitor e.g. top means he looks from upside down on it.
uiConfigApp.tinyUIHint: A tiny interface on this client screen for the defined user. There can be mutliple interfaces on one client.

TUIGamepadModule.desc: This is a context module. When activated it controls the Tiny-User-Interface

TokenRotation.desc: this module allows to control the direction your token is facing
